getValue

public float[] getValue()
Transform this Quaternion into an angle (radians) and an axis vector, about which to rotate (avoids NaN by setting sa to 1.0F when sa < epsilon)

Returns:
a new float[] where a0 = angle and a1 .. a3 are axis vector
